code:
//set data of user in localStorage
export const setUsersInStorage=users=>{return localStorage.setItem("users",JSON.stringify(users));};//get data of user from localStorage
export const getUsersInStorage=()=>{return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("users"))||[];};//set cookie of user
export const setCookie=userId=>{document.cookie="activeUserId=".concat(userId);return document.cookie;};//get cookie of user
export const getCookie=()=>{const cookieStored=document.cookie;const activeUserId=cookieStored.split("=")[1];return activeUserId||null;};//save contacts of user in localStorage
export const setContactInStorage=(userId,contact)=>{return localStorage.setItem(userId,JSON.stringify(contact));};//get contacts of user in localStorage
export const getContactInStorage=userId=>{return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(userId))||[];};export const clearCookie=()=>{document.cookie.split(";").forEach(function(c){document.cookie=c.replace(/^ +/,"").replace(/=.*/,"=;expires="+new Date().toUTCString()+";path=/");});};
